org.settings4j.connector.db
Class AbstractDBConnector

java.lang.Object
  org.settings4j.connector.AbstractConnector
      org.settings4j.connector.db.AbstractDBConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connector
Direct Known Subclasses:
HibernateDBConnector
public abstract class AbstractDBConnector
extends AbstractConnector

The basic Database implementation of a Connector-Interface.
A concrete Subclass must implement the Methode getSettingsDAO()
The implementation of the SettingsDAO could be Hibernate, JPA, Ibatis, JDBC or something else.

Author:
hbrabenetz

Constructor Detail

AbstractDBConnector

public AbstractDBConnector()
Method Detail

init

public void init()
This implementation adds a DBContentResolverAdapter to the contentResolver-List (at the first position). This ContentResolver will be used by the ObjectResolver

Specified by:
init in interface Connector
Overrides:
init in class AbstractConnector

getContent

public byte[] getContent(java.lang.String key)
return a byte[]-Value for the given key
The concrete implementation can use the ContentResolver if required

Parameters:
key - the Key for the configuration-property. e.g.: "com/mycompany/myapp/myParameterKey"
Returns:
the byte[]-Value for the given key

getObject

public java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.String key)
return a Object-Value for the given key
The concrete implementation can use the ObjectResolver if required

Parameters:
key - the Key for the configuration-property. e.g.: "com/mycompany/myapp/myParameterKey"
Returns:
the Object-Value for the given key, or null if no value where found.

setContent

public int setContent(java.lang.String key,
                      byte[] value)
Set or replace a new Value for the given key.
If set or replace a value is not possible because of a readonly Connector (e.g.: ClasspathConnector, then Constants.SETTING_NOT_POSSIBLE must be returned. If set or replace was successful, then Constants.SETTING_SUCCESS must be returned.

Parameters:
key - the Key for the configuration-property. e.g.: "com/mycompany/myapp/myParameterKey"
value - the new byte[]-Value for the given key
Returns:
Returns Constants.SETTING_SUCCESS or Constants.SETTING_NOT_POSSIBLE

setObject

public int setObject(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.Object value)
Set or replace a new Value for the given key.
If set or replace a value is not possible because of a readonly Connector (e.g.: ClasspathConnector, then Constants.SETTING_NOT_POSSIBLE must be returned. If set or replace was successful, then Constants.SETTING_SUCCESS must be returned.

Parameters:
key - the Key for the configuration-property. e.g.: "com/mycompany/myapp/myParameterKey"
value - the new Object-Value for the given key
Returns:
Returns Constants.SETTING_SUCCESS or Constants.SETTING_NOT_POSSIBLE

setString

public int setString(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.String value)
Set or replace a new Value for the given key.
If set or replace a value is not possible because of a readonly Connector (e.g.: ClasspathConnector, then Constants.SETTING_NOT_POSSIBLE must be returned. If set or replace was successful, then Constants.SETTING_SUCCESS must be returned.

Parameters:
key - the Key for the configuration-property. e.g.: "com/mycompany/myapp/myParameterKey"
value - the new String-Value for the given key
Returns:
Returns Constants.SETTING_SUCCESS or Constants.SETTING_NOT_POSSIBLE

getSettingsDAO

protected abstract SettingsDAO getSettingsDAO()
A concrete Subclass must implement this Methode
The implementation of the SettingsDAO could be Hibernate, JPA, Ibatis, JDBC or something else.

Returns:
a SettingsDAO Object
